effect_entries.effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Thunderbolt to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: DragonBreath)

flavor_text_entries.text:
強い　電撃を
相手に　浴びせて　攻撃する。
まひ状態に　することが　ある。

A strong electric blast crashes down on
the target. This may also leave the target
with paralysis.

Il bersaglio viene colpito da una potente scarica
elettrica che può anche paralizzarlo.

Atormenta al objetivo y le provoca un ataque de
ira que le impide usar el mismo movimiento dos
veces seguidas.

Das Ziel wird von einem verheerenden
Stromschlag getroffen. Kann eventuell
Paralyse bewirken.

Une grosse décharge électrique tombe sur
l’ennemi. Peut aussi le paralyser.

강한 전격을
상대에게 날려서 공격한다.
마비 상태로 만들 때가 있다.

つよい　でんげきを　あびせて
こうげきする。　あいてを　まひの
じょうたいに　することが　ある。

A strong electric blast is loosed at the
target. It may also leave the target
with paralysis.

A strong electric blast is loosed at the
target. It may also leave the target
with paralysis.

Une grosse décharge électrique tombe
sur l’ennemi. Peut aussi le paralyser.

A strong electric blast is loosed at
the foe. It may also leave the foe
paralyzed.

the foe. It may also leave the foe
paralyzed.

A strong electric blast is loosed at
the foe. It may also leave the foe
paralyzed.

A strong electrical
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

A powerful electric
attack that may
cause paralysis.
